thread.title: Murder suspect possibly holed up in Riverside apartment
thread.title_full: Murder suspect possibly holed up in Riverside apartment

title: Murder suspect possibly holed up in Riverside apartment
text:
tweet KABC 
Authorities swarmed an apartment complex in the 600 block of Central Ave in Riverside for a possible murder suspect on Wednesday, Feb. 1, 2017. KABC   05:13PM San Bernardino police and SWAT officers were at an apartment complex in Riverside where a murder suspect was believed to be holed up Wednesday afternoon, Eyewitness News has learned.Authorities surrounded the apartment building in the 600 block of Central Avenue, searching for a man accused of murdering a mother of two in San Bernardino just hours earlier.DEVELOPING: We will add more details to this report as they become available. Related Topics:
